metadata.title: AWS Database Specialty DBS-C01 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Workload-Specific Database Design (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Neptune Graph Queries (Gremlin/SPARQL) is a key concept in Workload-Specific Database Design. This domain covers topics essential for the AWS Database Specialty exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with determine strategies for disaster recovery and high availability. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any workload-specific database design task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Workload-Specific Database Design is most closely related to design database solutions for performance, compliance, and scalability?
options: Workload-Specific Database Design governance and oversight
Workload-Specific Database Design implementation and operations
Workload-Specific Database Design assessment and testing
questions.explanation: Design database solutions for performance, compliance, and scalability falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Workload-Specific Database Design.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Workload-Specific Database Design (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Amazon Keyspaces (Cassandra) is a key concept in Workload-Specific Database Design. This domain covers topics essential for the AWS Database Specialty exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with select appropriate database services for specific types of data and workloads?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with select appropriate database services for specific types of data and workloads, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Determine strategies for disaster recovery and high availability" in Workload-Specific Database Design?
options: To implement and manage determine strategies for disaster recovery and high availability processes
To evaluate compliance with workload-specific database design standards
questions.explanation: Determine strategies for disaster recovery and high availability is a key objective in Workload-Specific Database Design. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Workload-Specific Database Design (Domain 1)?
